attributes.action: Urgently review the pensions tax for public sector workers.
attributes.additional_details: This pension tax is completely counterproductive and I believe reviewing this will incentivise many frontline NHS staff to work more, not less.
attributes.background: The current pension tax is completely disincentivising frontline NHS staff, forcing them into early retirement or part time working. With Inflation the workforce will see massive tax bills and will be unable to pay these.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure what you mean by "pension tax". You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Make the NHS Pension scheme tax-unregistered: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/620093
